entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: E 46 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 this morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
